mapper.select: SELECT i.IDX, i.TITLE, i.HIT_CNT, i.REGIST_DATE, i.INQUIRY_STATE, i.RE_REF, r.MEMBER_ID, r.MEMBER_NICKNAME, r.ROLE_ID, i.PARENTS_ID FROM INQUIRY i, MEMBER_LIST r WHERE i.MEMBER_ID = r.MEMBER_ID AND DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY RE_REF DESC, RE_STEP ASC
SELECT i.IDX, i.TITLE, i.CONTENTS, i.HIT_CNT, i.REGIST_DATE, r.MEMBER_ID, r.MEMBER_NICKNAME, r.ROLE_ID, i.INQUIRY_STATE FROM INQUIRY i, MEMBER_LIST r WHERE i.MEMBER_ID = r.MEMBER_ID AND IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY ( INQUIRY_STATE, IDX, RE_STEP, RE_REF, REGIST_DATE, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, TITLE, CONTENTS, MEMBER_ID ) VALUES ( #{INQUIRY_STATE}, SEQ_INQUIRY_IDX.NEXTVAL, 0, SEQ_INQUIRY_IDX.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, 0, 'N', #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, #{MEMBER_ID} )
mapper.update: UPDATE INQUIRY SET HIT_CNT = NVL(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY ( INQUIRY_STATE, IDX, RE_STEP, RE_REF, REGIST_DATE, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, TITLE, CONTENTS, MEMBER_ID, PARENTS_ID ) VALUES ( #{INQUIRY_STATE}, SEQ_INQUIRY_IDX.NEXTVAL, 1, #{IDX}, SYSDATE, 0, 'N', #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{PARENTS_ID} )
mapper.update: UPDATE INQUIRY SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
